title: [Arctic Sea Ice Figures](https://sites.uci.edu/zlabe/arctic-sea-ice-figures/){target="blank"}
comments: Some of the best climate graphics on the Web. See [\@Zlabe](https://twitter.com/ZLabe){target="blank"} on Twitter for even more.

title: [Fundamentals of Data Visualization](https://serialmentor.com/dataviz/){target="blank"}
comments: I'm happy to own a hardcopy of this text, but it's online as well. The most comprehensive text on static figures that I know of.

title: [An Extremely Detailed Map of the 2016 Election](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2018/upshot/election-2016-voting-precinct-maps.html){target="blank"}
comments: A much criticized graphic but incredibly fun to explore nonetheless.

title: [There Are Many Ways to Map Election Results. We've Tried Most of Them.](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2016/11/01/upshot/many-ways-to-map-election-results.html){target="blank"}
comments: Required reading before any U.S. election.
